article_title: Meet Ben Carson, the GOP field’s positive, pleasant outsider

article_metadata.title: Meet Ben Carson, the GOP field’s positive, pleasant outsider | Miami Herald

og.description: Ben Carson doesn’t shout. He doesn’t throw zingers, and he rarely disparages rival presidential candidates. In a period when Donald Trump’s bluster dominates the 2016 presidential race, Carson seldom says anything provocative enough to generate TV news coverage.
og.title: Meet Ben Carson, the GOP field’s positive, pleasant outsider
